Uses of Package
com.epam.exception.services

Packages that use com.epam.exception.services
Package
Description
com.epam.services
 
com.epam.services.impl
 
com.epam.util
 
  • Classes in com.epam.exception.services used by com.epam.services
    Class
    Description
    NegativeUserBalanceException
    A Service exception that will be thrown if an attempt to change a user's balance results in a negative user balance.
    NoTransactionsFoundException
    A service exception that will be thrown if an attempt to retrieve a user transaction results in an empty collection.
    PasswordNotMatchException
    The service exception that will be thrown if a password change attempt was made with an incorrect current password.
    TariffServiceException
    The general Tariff service exception.
    TransactionServiceException
    The general Transaction service exception.
    UserAlreadyExistException
    A service exception that will be thrown when trying to add an existing user.
    UserAlreadyHasTariffException
    A service exception that will be thrown when trying to add an existing tariff to user.
    UserNotFoundException
    A service exception that will be thrown when trying to get not existing user.
    UserServiceException
    The general User service exception.
